text: Egh kɨ an gumazamiziba bar me inigh ua nɨ bagh izam. Me mati amizim datɨrɨghɨra pamɨn ikegha a basemegha arav ghugha, gɨn a uamategha uan pam bagha ize. Nɨ kamaghɨn ifonge, nɨ Devit mɨsueghtɨ an aremeghtɨ, gumazamiziba deravɨra ikiam.”17:3 Hibrun akam deragha vezɨn kamɨn mɨngarim abɨghizir puvatɨ. Bar fomɨra gumazir maba akar kam Grighɨn akamɨn a giragha an osiri, ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn Aruamɨn akam Grighɨn akamɨn gɨn zui.
